channel.title: Swedish Tech Events (Malmö)
channel.description: Events for developers, technologists, and other geeks in Sweden

item.title: 2020-03-19 19:00 Web Devs Meetup - WEB DEVELOPERS ÖRESUND
item.description: Hi web developers. It's time for a new meetup. I've been busy over the last 3 months, so I was not able to hold the meetup during that period. Now I've got more free time and would like to organize our 8:th web developers meetup. As usual, we gather to talk about the la...

item.description: • What we'll do It is time for your favorite monthly startup event! Yay! It may be cold outside but it is warm and cosy with inspiration, ideas and positive energy at the Dojo. Get the help you need to move past and beyond your next "Do" moment. Get assistanc...

item.title: 2020-04-20 17:30 Making interactive web apps with {shiny} - SkåneR UseR! Group
item.description: {shiny} is a popular R package for making interactive web interfaces in R. With it you can build an interface to your data in just a few steps, allowing you or your users to explore and interact with the data directly. In this workshop, we will go through the minimum st...

item.title: 2020-04-01 18:00 Infrastructure as Code for Cloud - AWS User Group Öresund
item.description: SARS-CoV2 update: We will respect both official and host guidelines and policies. So far this event is not cancelled but it is possible this could change at any time. The team will let you know if this event needs to be postponed or cancelled. Stay well everyone! We'll ...

item.title: 2020-03-26 18:00 Intro to Neo4j - Neo4j-Öresund
item.description: Neo4j is a graph database. What does that mean? What's it used for? What can it do for me? Does it have something to do with GraphQL? We'll answer these questions and more with this introduction to Neo4j with a mix of presentation, demonstration and hands-on experimenta...

item.title: 2020-03-17 18:00 Critical Tech Afterwork
item.description: Hi critical techies, We would like to host a casual afterwork to just meet and talk about tech topics that are currently on our minds! It’s been 3 years since we started this meet up and we always have an interesting and curious crowd that attends to our workshops, ...
